ai-patthana12.2:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.2:1.1_0: or cause or reason it doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition for the sake of reason.
ai-patthana12.2:1.1_2: or cause or reason why these things don’t arise for the sake of (good) conduct, without cause or condition.
ai-patthana12.2:2.1_0: Not cause or reasoning or condition,
ai-patthana12.2:2.1_1: Not cause or conditioned by teaching, nor by conditions.
ai-patthana12.2:2.1_2: Thoughts not cause or conditioned by the teaching, nor by the cause, and with the reason.
ai-patthana12.2:3.1_0: It’s not because of or cause or reason to give rise to cause or condition.
ai-patthana12.2:3.1_1: It’s not easy for them to give rise to cause or condition.
ai-patthana12.2:3.1_2: It’s not because of cause or condition, nor for the sake of reason, nor for the sake of these reasons.
ai-patthana12.2:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana12.2:5.1_0: It’s not possible to teach the Dhamma that’s in brief,
ai-patthana12.2:6.1_0: He should not give a teaching to anyone holding a sunshade.
ai-patthana12.2:7.1_0: don’t have any resentment to teaching,
ai-patthana12.2:8.1_0: don’t give a teaching, nor for one sake of it.
ai-patthana12.2:9.1_0: You shouldn’t have any form at all.
ai-patthana12.2:10.1_0: It’s not appropriate for you to have no cause or reason why someone can’t stay definitively for one kindness.
ai-patthana12.2:11.1_0: You shouldn’t recite the teaching of the noble ones, or you can’t give rise to yet.
ai-patthana12.2:12.1_0: He should not give a teaching to anyone with a monk who is unable to understand the Teaching, nor to make a point.
